name: Alien Extraction
description:
There's a big alien mess and somebody's gotta clean it up...

Control an alien infested space station from the safety of your security desk in this funny, brain bending VR simulator game. You're a space security guard; you need to guide the station janitor, Lenny, through dangerous situations while earning achievements along the way.


Use every tool at your disposal:

  • Control the space facility from the comfort of your security desk
  • Scour video feeds for alien movements and secrets
  • Pilot security drones to explore, distract aliens and lead Lenny to safety
  • Traverse the facility unreliable minimap
  • Deal with the station's faulty software systems
  • Enjoy sweet tunes from your office radio
